sequences.description: Two-column layout: left column has H1 heading 'Fresh fits, bold moves — Trends for every vibe.', paragraph text, two CTA buttons ('See trends' primary, 'Explore the blog' secondary outline); right column has 3 images in a vertical grid
sequences.reason: Page intro with heading, text, buttons, and images in two-column layout. Requires structured hero block. Reused existing variant (100% match).

sequences.description: Centered H2 heading 'Trend alert' with subtitle paragraph 'Fresh fits, bold moves'
sequences.reason: Author can type a heading and paragraph normally. Centering is CSS.

sequences.description: Two-column layout: large image (3:2 aspect) on left, H3 heading 'Trendy looks, real moments' + paragraph + CTA button 'Explore young adult trends' on right
sequences.reason: Side-by-side content (image | text+button) requires columns block structure. Reused existing variant (90% match).

sequences.description: Centered H2 heading 'Trends that turn heads'
sequences.reason: Author can type a heading normally.

sequences.description: Grid of 3 items: each with image (3:2 aspect), H3 heading (Street style / Sporty vibes / Night out), and short description text
sequences.reason: Repeating structured pattern of items in a grid. New variant created (65% match with existing cards-article).

sequences.description: Centered H2 heading 'Style in every snapshot' with subtitle 'Peek the latest looks in action'
sequences.reason: Author can type a heading and paragraph normally.

sequences.description: Grid of 6 square (1:1 aspect) images in 3 columns × 2 rows
sequences.reason: Grid of image items requires block layout. Cards block with image-only content. Reused existing variant (75% match).

sequences.description: Centered H2 heading 'Fresh looks, bold vibes, endless inspo', paragraph 'Stay up to date with the latest trends and stories.', CTA button 'Join now'
sequences.reason: Author can type heading, paragraph, and link normally. Yellow background handled by section-metadata style=accent.

hero.structure: 1 row with 1 column: image, heading, paragraph(s). For two-column variant: heading+text+buttons on one side, images on the other.

columns.structure: 2 columns per row. Each column contains content (text, images, links). Row 1: col1 + col2 side by side.

cards.structure: Each card = 1 row with 2 columns: image cell | text cell (heading + paragraph). For image-only cards: 1 column with just images.
